reviews.review: SO MANY CHEATERS! Also if you don't have hacks you usually get kicked for not hacking. Don't bother with match making unless you use Face It or ESEA. But other than being able to play the game its a fun game to play against and with friends on a private server.

Good for a few quick rounds of Deathmatch due to good matchmaking. People just tend to play the same old boring maps over and over. Random respawn, invulnerability in DM, the ability MOVE mid-air and illogical weapon spray makes it frustrating. As do all the stupid cosmetics, crates and unlocks. I paid for this game, can you stop ruining it like you did TF2, Valve? Sound design is weird, footsteps can be heard across the map yet the weapon discharge makes less noise than an electric stapler. This is not the CounterStrike of old, it is a streamlined time- and money sink, with all the worst parts of modern gaming incorporated. It does not make it bad, just very bland and functional. But I require more from a game these days.
